Class IllegalArgumentException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • IllegalArgumentException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class IllegalArgumentException
extends Exception
    This class extends the Exception class by writing a custom IllegalArgumentException. When utilized it will inform the user that they are out of bounds if they are out of bounds and lead to an exception being thrown
    See Also:
